title: opr-group-bnitm/vimop
description: Reference-based virus assembly with automatic reference selection from ONT reads.

fastq.description: Path to input FASTQ files directory, can be RUN directories with barcode subdirectories or single barcode directories

sample_sheet.title: Sample sheet
sample_sheet.description: A CSV file used to map barcodes to sample aliases. The sample sheet can be provided when the input data is a directory containing sub-directories with FASTQ files.
sample_sheet.help_text: The sample sheet is a CSV file with, minimally, columns named `barcode` and `alias`. Extra columns are allowed. A `type` column is required for certain workflows and should have the following values; `test_sample`, `positive_control`, `negative_control`, `no_template_control`.

custom_ref_fasta.title: Custom reference FASTA
custom_ref_fasta.description: Optional custom FASTA file for consensus generation
custom_ref_fasta.help_text: Optional: Provide a custom FASTA file that contains sequences for the consensus generation. These sequences will be used for consensus generation with each sample besides the sequences that are found using the draft assembly. The file can contain multiple sequences. The Entry-ID of each sequence will be used as the file name of for the consensus generation.

download_db_update_existing.description: Update the data bases if a newer version exists. This will overwrite your existing files.

targets.help_text: Comma-separated list of viruses to prioritize, e.g., 'LCMV,MS2,LASV'. Leave empty for no prioritization.

assemble_notarget.help_text: Whether to also assemble reads that were not assigned to any specific target.

contamination_filters.help_text: Comma-separated list of contaminant types to filter, e.g., 'reagent,human_dna,human_rna'.

centrifuge_do_classify.title: Run centrifuge classification
centrifuge_do_classify.description: Turn centrifuge classification on or off.
centrifuge_do_classify.help_text: Turn off to not classify reads and contigs.

centrifuge_plot_min_frac.title: Minimum fraction for display.
centrifuge_plot_min_frac.description: Minimum classification fraction for display in report sunburst plot.
centrifuge_plot_min_frac.help_text: Only relevant for visualization in the report. 0.0001 for example means that at least 1 in 10,000 reads are needed for a group to be shown in the sunburst plot in the report.

centrifuge_do_filter.title: Use centrifuge filter
centrifuge_do_filter.help_text: Whether to filter non-viral reads based on the centrifuge classifications. Use to remove bacterial reads.

centrifuge_filter_min_score.help_text: Reads that are classified as non-viral with a score higher than or equal to this are removed.

trim_length.help_text: Number of bases that get removed from both sides of each read.

output.title: Output Options
output.description: Parameters for saving and naming outputs

out_dir.title: Output directory
out_dir.description: Output directory, should be the RUN directory where the subdirectory with the output for each sample is created
out_dir.help_text: Directory where the final results and reports will be saved. Can be absolute or relative path.

output_cleaned_reads.help_text: If enabled, cleaned reads after contamination removal will be written to output directory.

output_krona_plot.help_text: If enabled, a separate read classification Krona plot will be written into a HTML file in the output directory. This file can be opened in the browser.

database_options.title: Advanced: Data Base
database_options.description: Advanced settings for reference data base customization.

base_db.help_text: Path to base directory that contains the virus, contaminants and classification data base

virus_db.help_text: Path to virus database that contains all virus sequences for BLAST search and consensus creation

virus_db_config.description: Configuration file for the virus database
virus_db_config.help_text: YAML configuration file for the virus database.

contaminants_db.help_text: Path to contaminants database (e.g., human DNA/RNA, prokaryotic contaminants).

contaminants_db_config.description: Configuration file for the contaminants database
contaminants_db_config.help_text: YAML configuration file for contaminants database.

classification_db.description: Path to classification database directory containing .cf files for centrifuge
classification_db.help_text: Path to a classification database used by centrifuge, should contain .cf files.

classification_db_config.description: Configuration file for the classification database
classification_db_config.help_text: YAML configuration file for classification database.

denovo_assembly_options.title: Advanced: De-novo assembly
denovo_assembly_options.description: Advanced settings for mapping and consensus creation.

canu_min_read_length.help_text: Reads shorter than this threshold are excluded from the assembly process.

canu_min_overlap_length.help_text: Overlaps shorter than this value are disregarded.

canu_genome_size.description: Estimated total genome size for Canu
canu_genome_size.help_text: An estimate of the genome size to be assembled.

canu_read_sampling_bias.help_text: Bias towards selecting longer reads during downsampling.

canu_max_input_coverage.help_text: Maximum coverage to use for the assembly input.

canu_cor_out_coverage.help_text: Controls how many reads will be corrected in the correction phase.

canu_stop_on_low_coverage.help_text: If coverage drops below this value, Canu will stop.

canu_min_input_coverage.help_text: Minimum required coverage before Canu starts assembling.

nocontigs_enable_read_usage.description: Enable usage of reads even if no contigs are assembled.

nocontigs_max_reads_precluster.description: Max number of reads to use before clustering (no-contigs path).

nocontigs_nreads.description: Number of reads to sample for no-contigs scenario.

nocontigs_cdhit_wordlen.description: CD-HIT word length for no-contigs mode.

reassemble_cdhit_wordlen.description: CD-HIT word length for reassembly step.

consensus_options.title: Advanced: Reference based assembly
consensus_options.description: Advanced settings for mapping and consensus creation.

sv_do_call_structural_variants.title: Call structural variants
sv_do_call_structural_variants.description: Before consensus is created update the references with structural variants
sv_do_call_structural_variants.help_text: If true structural variants are called and used for consensus creation

sv_method.title: Method for structural variant calling
sv_method.description: Use this structural variant caller. Choices are sniffles and cutesv.

sv_cap_coverage.description: Cut reads to achieve this coverage before structural variant calling. Set to 0 to use all reads.

sniffles_min_support.description: Minimum support for structural variants by variant caller sniffles.
sniffles_min_support.help_text: Minimum support for structural variants by variant caller sniffles.

sniffles_min_sv_len.description: Minimum length of structural variants in sniffles.

sniffles_min_variant_allele_fraction.description: Minimum allele fraction for structural variants.

cutesv_min_support.description: Minimum support for structural variants by variant caller cutesv.
cutesv_min_support.help_text: Minimum support for structural variants by variant caller cutesv.

cutesv_min_sv_len.description: Minimum length of structural variants in cutesv.

cutesv_min_variant_allele_fraction.description: Minimum allele fraction for structural variants.

cutesv_min_read_len.description: Minimum length of reads to be taken into account by cutesv.

cutesv_min_mapq.description: Minimum map quality of reads to be taken into account by cutesv.

consensus_method.description: Consensus method to use. Choose from auto (recommended), simple and medaka.

map_to_target_minimap_window_size.help_text: Minimap2 window size used during target mapping.

map_to_target_minimap_kmer_size.help_text: K-mer size used by Minimap2 for seed generation.

medaka_consensus_model.description: The name of a Medaka model to use. By default the workflow will select an appropriate Medaka model from the basecaller configuration provided. Entering a name here will override the automated selection and use the Medaka model named here.
medaka_consensus_model.help_text: The workflow will attempt to map the basecalling model used to a suitable Medaka consensus model. You can override this by providing a model with this option instead.

consensus_min_depth.help_text: Minimum coverage depth required at a position.

consensus_min_share.description: Minimum allele share for consensus base
consensus_min_share.help_text: Fraction of reads supporting a base required for it to be called.

consensus_medaka_min_qual.description: Minimum quality for medaka variant calls

target_filter_minimap_index_split_thresh.description: Size threshold of referene fasta to split minimap index when filtering target reads.

min_ram_gb.description: Minimum RAM to run the workflow

min_cpus.description: Minimum number of CPUs for the workflow

min_disk_space_work_gb.description: Minimum disk space for the work directory of the workflow

min_disk_space_out_gb.description: Minimum disk space for the output directory of the workflow

download_db_min_disk_space_home_gb.description: Minimum disk space available in the default data base directory for storing the data base

custom_db_min_disk_space_out_gb.description: Minimum disk space available in the custom data base directory for storing the data base
